alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:11PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Boundary, southwestern Bonner, northern Benewah, Kootenai, northeastern Whitman, eastern Spokane and southeastern Pend Oreille Counties through 200 PM PDT... At 110 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Newport to 9 miles south of Plummer. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spokane Valley, Coeur d`Alene, Post Falls, Hayden, Rathdrum, St. Maries, Dalton Gardens, Priest River, Liberty Lake, Newport, Spirit Lake, Plummer, Athol, Hauser, Hayden Lake, Dover, Harrison, Otis Orchards-East Farms, Parkline, and Otis Orchards. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 293 and 299. Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 0 and 34. U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 384 and 465. U.S. Highway 2 in Idaho between mile markers 0 and 25. U.S. Highway 2 in Washington between mile markers 320 and 334. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse; Northern Panhandle
